notes.text:
This update for indent fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-40305: Fixed a memory safety issues bug. (bsc#1214243)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: GNU indent 2.2.13 has a heap-based buffer overflow in search_brace in indent.c via a crafted file.
notes.title: CVE description
